datacompy_report
================

<!-- WARNING: THIS FILE WAS AUTOGENERATED! DO NOT EDIT! -->

## Install

``` sh
pip install datacompy-report
```

## How to use

1.  Create ‘datacompy.core.Compare’ object
2.  Instantiate a new `datacompy_report.DatacompyReport` object
3.  Create Report:
    - Excel format
    - more to come…
